attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For many a year, Bill has spent time perfecting the art of round avoidance.  With his extra long pockets and doorway dallying, the man has become famed for his long thirst.


Well, no more as we say "BILL, BUY A ROUND"

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
